New Records: Roston Chase scored 42 runs and 4 sixes in the match.
Assad Vala was named Man of the Match with 83.87 points.
Key Match Events: West Indies won the match by 5 wickets with 6 balls remaining.
The match went down to the wire with close calls and critical moments.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the 2nd in Group C of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024.
Providence Stadium in Guyana hosted the match.
